MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 16-JAN-2021 12:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the L35 and WA8 postcode areas of Prescot and Widnes. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:10am. Repairs on the overhead lines near Lodge Lane is taking longer than expected because of the works required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.09am on 16th January 2021.
